definition: lit. fifth child of the Wangs/bachelor
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: In order to commemorate the day, they nicknamed it Singles Day.

sentences.english: She hooked up with one of the city's typically eligible bachelors .
sentences.chinese: 她勾搭上了城里的黄金王老五。

sentences.english: It is also possible to chat with your fellow wealthy colleagues whom also bought the program.
sentences.chinese: 您可以和购买了这个产品的钻石王老五们聊天。

sentences.english: There are two men looking for you, the Chinese in Wang Laowu.

sentences.english: What  town do you think is the best to find truly rich singles?
